attributes.name: isInstalled
attributes.description: Indicates whether this patch is installed

attributes.name: isDownloaded
attributes.description: Indicates whether all the update content is cached on the computer

attributes.name: isUninstallable
attributes.description: Indicates whether a patch can be uninstalled

attributes.name: rebootBehavior
attributes.description: Reboot behavior of the patch (alwaysRequiresReboot, canRequestReboot, neverReboots)

attributes.name: pendingReboot
attributes.description: If this patch pends a reboot

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the update (software or driver)

attributes.name: categories
attributes.description: List of categories (like type, platform, etc.)

attributes.name: lastDeploymentChangeTime
attributes.description: Last published date of the update (UTC)

attributes.name: msrcSeverity
attributes.description: Microsoft Security Response Center severity rating of the update

attributes.name: supportUrl
attributes.description: Hyperlink to the language-specific support information
